about.description:
This software trains a generative neural network on an ensemble of molecular conformations (typically
obtained by molecular dynamics). The trained model can be used to generate new, plausible
conformations repesentative of poorly sampled transition states.
about.summary: Molearn contains methods to train neural networks on ensembles of molecular conformations

about.description:
This software trains a generative neural network on an ensemble of molecular conformations (typically
obtained by molecular dynamics). The trained model can be used to generate new, plausible
conformations repesentative of poorly sampled transition states.
about.summary: Molearn contains methods to train neural networks on ensembles of molecular conformations

name: molearn
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "molearn" %}
{% set version = "2.0.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/Degiacomi-Lab/molearn/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 464d912c32fb9bc23ca2bfde4649f687ee5c3a09d67ac0fd8f1ca74bb82a26d4

build:
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - __unix
    - python >=3.6
    - numpy
    - pytorch
    - biobox
    - openmmtorchplugin
test:
  imports:
    - molearn
  source_files:
    - test
  commands:
    - pip check
    - cd test
    - python example_script.py
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/Degiacomi-Lab/molearn
  license_file: LICENSE
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Molearn contains methods to train neural networks on ensembles of molecular conformations
  description: |
    This software trains a generative neural network on an ensemble of molecular conformations (typically
    obtained by molecular dynamics). The trained model can be used to generate new, plausible
    conformations repesentative of poorly sampled transition states.
  doc_url: https://github.com/Degiacomi-Lab/molearn
  dev_url: https://github.com/Degiacomi-Lab/molearn

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - SCMusson
    - degiacom
